unit.enum: enum UniMode {uni8Bit=0, uniUTF8=1, uni16BE=2, uni16LE=3, uniCookie=4, uni7Bit=5, uni16BE_NoBOM=6, uni16LE_NoBOM=7, uniEnd};
enum ChangeDetect {cdDisabled=0, cdEnabled=1, cdAutoUpdate=2, cdGo2end=3, cdAutoUpdateGo2end=4};
unit.decl_stmt: const TCHAR fontSizeStrs[][3] = {TEXT(""), TEXT("8"), TEXT("9"), TEXT("10"), TEXT("11"), TEXT("12"), TEXT("14"), TEXT("16"), TEXT("18"), TEXT("20"), TEXT("22"), TEXT("24"), TEXT("26"), TEXT("28")};
